title: ISA Completion & Reporting
description: Completion procedures covering subsequent events, going concern, written representations, and documentation closures.

items.text: Inquire of management and TCWG regarding subsequent events up to the report date.
Review post year-end board/committee minutes for adjusting/non-adjusting events.
Evaluate if identified events require adjustment or disclosure and document conclusions.
Obtain management's going concern assessment covering â‰¥12 months from report date.
Evaluate mitigating plans and supporting evidence (cash flow forecasts, financing arrangements).
Conclude on GC; determine if EOM/KAM or modified opinion required.
Prepare representation letter covering financial statements and specific assertions.
Obtain signed management representations dated on or near the audit report date.
Address any contradictions between representations and other evidence.
Ensure workpapers are properly referenced, indexed, and cross-referenced to the FS.
Capture review notes cleared; maintain final sign-off evidence (manager/partner/EQR).
Complete assembly within 60 days; lock workpaper set and record archive hash.
